title: hub.signal Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Receive a signal (a near-real-time note) from Notehub.

seconds.description: The number of seconds to wait before timing out the request.

annotations.title: warning
annotations.description: A Notecard must be in continuous mode and have its `sync` argument set to `true` to receive signals.

annotations.title: note
annotations.description: See our guide to [Using Inbound Signals](/guides-and-tutorials/notecard-guides/minimizing-latency#using-inbound-signals) for more information on how to set up a host microcontroller or single-board computer to receive inbound signals.
